channel.title: Abouts on Josep Puig's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Josep Puig's Webpage

item.title: About
item.description: Resume Consultant with experience in quantitative projects about modeling and data mining to obtain competitive advantages for companies. He has mainly worked in the financial sector but also in Energy, Public Administrations and Defense. He has participated in projects of development of predictive and econometric models, database design and also functional and strategic projects. Results-oriented professional with deep analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, combined with strong quantitative education and programming knowledge in R, Python, SAS and SQL as well as visualization tools and Business Intelligence like Tableau, Qlik Sense, Power BI.
